name: A R T I F I C I A L (Final by Brett and Jackson)
name_original: A R T I F I C I A L (Final by Brett and Jackson)
description: Looking at the image of your wife brings a tear to your eye. It feels like you have been taking these missions forever and yet the memories are fading. Yet something has changed, almost as if this entire time it was artificial. Take down the technological menace and bring the fight directly to your contractor, it is time to go, rogue! It is hard to describe but a part of this feels artificial and the only way to get answers is to find your secret contact Ethos.
